title: Impulse Tester
subtitle: 3 models from 30V to 1200V, 100V to 5000V, and 500V to 10kV

paragraphs: The WK 7820 Series Impulse Tester is designed to deliver high-performance impulse testing, ranging from a low voltage of 30V up to a high voltage of 10kV. With models offering single to eight channels, this series caters to a broad spectrum of testing requirements in the industry. Featuring a state-of-the-art 32-bit CPU and high-density SMD technology, the WK 7820 series provides precision and ease of use with its 7-inch TFT color display, enhancing user experience and operational efficiency.

applications: Quality control and R&D in manufacturing environments dealing with electrical components and assemblies
Safety testing in electrical engineering and construction sectors
Educational and testing institutions requiring detailed analysis and characterization of electrical components

features.title: Versatile Voltage Range
features.description: Models in the WK 7820 series can test impulses from 30V to 10kV, accommodating a wide variety of testing scenarios

features.title: High-Speed Performance
features.description: Achieves a maximum measuring speed of 6 measurements per second, with a waveform sampling rate of up to 200Msps, ensuring fast and accurate testing

features.title: Advanced Corona Extraction
features.description: Incorporates a patent high-fidelity corona extraction algorithm, allowing for detailed analysis of the insulation properties of products

features.title: Multi-Channel Testing
features.description: Offers configurations from 1 up to 8 channels, providing flexibility for tests requiring multiple simultaneous measurements

features.title: Comprehensive Memory and Storage
features.description: Equipped with a storage depth of 6k Bytes and the capability to store 20 groups of instrument settings for efficient test setup and execution

features.title: Flexible Interface Options
features.description: Includes RS232C, USB, LAN, and Handler interfaces for comprehensive connectivity and remote control capabilities

features.title: Durable and Reliable Design
features.description: Ensures robust performance with features like foot control interface and system firmware upgradable via USB

specifications.heading: Memory
content: 20 groups of standard waveform data and instrument setup can be stored in internal non-volatile memory
USB flash memory can be used as external memory

specifications.heading: Interface
content: Handler, RS232C, USB Device, USB Host, LAN
